reviews.text: Stayed for one night. Room was very clean and well stocked.
reviews.title: Very Clean, good service.

reviews.text: Restaurant food well prepared and drlicious. Complete breakfast buffet. Restaurant staff service very good.
reviews.title: Very well located and staff very helpful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is located in a business area.
reviews.title: Classy place

reviews.text: We spent two days in Koln and stayed at Lindner. The rooms are wide, the breakfast is complete, two blocks from cathedral and staff is helpful.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.text: When we arrived the restaurant was already closed, past 11pm but they were able to arrange something for eating.
reviews.title: central...

reviews.text: Great location! Just a five minute walk from the central train station, cathedral, and shops. Staff was courteous and helpful, with good English. Our room was ready early. We paid for the in room wifi, and it worked well.
reviews.title: Great hotel for walking tourists

reviews.text: Very nice place, quite close to Cologne's Cathedral, yet located in a very quiet and agreeable street. The people of the reception were always super nice to us, spoke perfect English and recommended us places (we were looking for a supermarket and a drugstore). Large, luminous, very clean rooms. Internet for 9 Euros per day! But everything else OK. I would come back.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: Quite new, close to central station and city center. Friendly staff, solid prices. Breakfast is just ok.
reviews.title: Good to use

reviews.text: Wifi is not free in the rooms, but computer is in lobby.
reviews.title: Good hotel for city trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location of the hotel wins.
reviews.title: Good Location and Service

reviews.text: Just a quick note....
reviews.title: Great value for Hotel!!!

reviews.text: If you book in advance thru their website, you get a great deal.
reviews.title: Deserves Much Higher Ranking

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is very clean and the staff is very helpful.
reviews.title: Not value for money!

reviews.text: It is right around the corner from the Hilton (and half the price) and 3 or 4 blocks from the catheral.
reviews.title: a slight let-down, but great, overall

likes.disliked: — mean: internet should be free nowadays

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I didn't find a major different between the Hilton (where I stayed the last time) and the Linder.
reviews.title: Your average business hotel.

likes.liked: — Location near to the main rail station.

reviews.text: The location of the hotel is quite good, the rooms are spacious and clean and the breakfast buffet has wide variety.
reviews.title: Great fitness area and spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: But the most pleasant surprise, was the fitness area and swimming pool, were we got to relax after a long day.
reviews.title: Excellent Central Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 4 nights Monday to Friday and were very impressed with the Hotel.
reviews.title: Great Hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Luckily through Hotels.com we had booked a delux room which was a large room on the 7th floor and included Tea & Coffee, bath & shower bits, a safe and Fridge.
reviews.title: 15 minutes walk from the Cologne Cathedral...

reviews.text: Breakfast was offered at 23 euro each which we declined as with a fridge and kettle and plenty of supermarkets or cafes close it was easier to cater for ourselves.
reviews.title: Good central hotel

reviews.text: In the overall this hotel is fine only if you are a tourist. However, if you are on business and would like your shifts washed and ironed for an important meeting on Monday, forget it. There is no laundry and since everything is outsourced, it simply cannot be done on Sunday or on public holiday. I was in the middle of the business trip there and had to go to the coin operated laundry around the corner and buy couple of shirts in the shop. Luckilly, shops were opened!
reviews.title: Not for a business traveller

reviews.text: There are no other standard business facilities, only one computer in the hallway with the printer attached with no instructions how to use it etc. They charge a fee for internet and gym. The room service menu is limited.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.text: I booked our international cricket team of 12 people into Dom for 2 nights. Most of the rooms were ready early and the service of the front desk excellent. The rooms were fine for us, the leisure facilities good and the location excellent (especially as we used the train station during our stay as well as drinking in the old quarter).
reviews.title: not quite tops, but better than average

reviews.text: We didn't have breakfast, want to use the internet or need anything else so I can't offer any complaints at all.
reviews.title: good hotel and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great stay, highly recommended.
reviews.title: Their Restaurant is a great find

reviews.text: Finding the entrance to the car park was challenging, but after that I had a good stay. The room was reasonably sized, and the beds were comfortable. The air conidtioning was only adequate - although it was quite warm outside, it only managed to cool the room down to 23C, which is not cold enough (for me). The pool was medium sized, but the arrangements for getting to it were as complicated as getting into the car park - it seems to be run by the adjacent block of flats and is accessed from what seems to be a fire escape.
reviews.title: Very good

reviews.text: Breakfast was excellent with a large selection. The location of the hotel was superb - about 5 minutes walk from the Cathedral and Railway station, but in a very quiet street. A nice extra touch was the bowl of fruit outside the lift. Recommended.
reviews.title: Great hotel
